system.description: Gnomes are small, energetic people driven by boundless curiosity and inventive genius. They delight in discovery and creation, combining keen intellect with playful mischief.
traits: Gnome Cunning: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.
Artificer's Lore: Whenever you make an Intelligence check related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices, you can add double your proficiency.
Tinker: You have proficiency with artisan's tools (tinker's tools).
